website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and comfortable leggings great for everyday wear.
pros: Customers loved the soft feel and stretchy fabric of these leggings
They also appreciated the material, which is not sheer but still lightweight
These also stand out for standing up to wear and washing without fading or shrinking
cons: A few were less than satisfied with the color, which didn't appear as saturated as some other brands, and a few users felt they wore out too quickly

customer_reviews.title: Buttery soft, warm and not see through!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what kind of black magic sorcery they used to make these leggings so damn comfortable and NOT see through. So buttery soft, warm, and flattering. I'm a size 12 in jeans, athletic legs and some junk in the trunk, and I ordered the 0-12 size on a whim and they fit like a glove and are the perfect length for me at 5'7". Once I tried on my first pair and realized they're this amazing, I ordered a second pair because "mom life" and I live in leggings. If you're debating wether or not to order these, do it.
customer_reviews.author: chelleandy 16

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Comfortable and sexxxy! The fabric is heaven...so soft and stretchy. I bought these in pink and my husband nearly lost his mind when he saw and felt them. One time through the wash and dryer and they are exactly the same. Today I got my new tourquois, mocha and white. The mocha was a bit darker than I expected, but I like! I will try to attach pics. Stats 5'8" 200lbs 60yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bresnahan

customer_reviews.title: #noregrets
customer_reviews.text: At first I was super nervous on getting these because it was one size. But it is soo perfect! I'm 5'3 and weigh 106lbs and I got 0-12 which I don't regret. Super comfy and true to color, size, and it was a good stretchy. Sry about the bikini top, I also tried on a bikini which was also amazing!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Worst Purchase of the Year
customer_reviews.text: I would give this item negative stars if I could. The dye from the black leggings stained my new exercise ball, and stained my new chair. I can get cheap leggings elsewhere that don't destroy my new, more expensive things. The lines in the pictures are from the seam inbetween the legs of the tights. This occured AFTER I had washed them too. So not worth it. Nothing will get the stains out. I deeply regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KissedByPixies

customer_reviews.title: Must. Order. More!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8" and ~200lbs, and these leggings are AMAZING. They are not see-through at all, they go all the way to my ankle with a tiny bit of bunching, they sit comfortably up above my hips, and they are SO SOFT. I feel like I'm wearing LuLa without having paid $30+ a pair. Ordering more of these right now.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pyle

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Amazing Tights
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable!!!! I love these tights... they were white without being see through and fit perfect even though I was pregnant!!! I wanna order these in so many different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sonnier

customer_reviews.title: Poison pants?
customer_reviews.text: First of all, these leggings aren’t leggings. They are loose pants. Let’s get that straight. Second of all, I have washed these at least a dozen times, and every time I wear them, they leave my skin stained black. I’m absolutely disgusted. Do you know what kind of chemicals are in clothing dye? And your skin is the largest organ of the body? So you’re basically ingesting all that poison just by wearing clothes. It doesn’t just wash off either. I have to scrub and it’s still there on my skin. The ONLY thing these have going for them is their super soft feel. But it’s not worth clogging my lymphatic system with garbage chemicals for minimal comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Urban

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These would have been great tights had the not come to me with 2 LARGE holes.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Comer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So I was dragged to this lularoe party and felt obligated to buy a pair of those way overpriced leggings. These are the exact same if not better! Super soft and seem a lot better quality! It does say hand wash and hang dry. However I washed and ddried them in the washer and dryer to do a deep clean before wear and they came out perfect. Can't beat the price and quality
customer_reviews.author: Amber Olson

customer_reviews.title: Weird tight band at top. Ripped immediately
customer_reviews.text: The material is soft that’s where the good ends. First let me say I am not a big girl by any means. Though I just had a baby a month ago and I’m still a 4 or 6. The first time I put them on I noticed a tight band around the top. It popped and ripped the top the pants as soon as I put them on. And thank God it did because otherwise that band around the top would’ve been so tight I wouldn’t of been able to breathe. Even after it popped and broke its still tight and it’s uncomfortable at the top. Based on the reviews I’m super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Stolz-Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a large in leggings. Based on some reviews I ordered larger. They are still REALLY SMALL. These will be fine for around the house but I would never wear them out. The material is so thin that the cut I have on my knee could be seen through the fabric. Every little thing you can see. The material is super soft, but that's about the only good thing. The leggings that are 2 for 10 at Walgreens are even better quality, and that's a really low bar.
customer_reviews.author: CharlyL21

customer_reviews.title: Print was very bad quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were very poor quality. I knew they were a great price, but it did not say that I was purchasing a 2nd quality product. One side of the left leg had a flaw in the print that continued down the leg. I'm including pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: I love the fit and the softness of them
customer_reviews.text: I got these to put an iron on decal on the leg and being seamless it worked out perfectly. I love the fit and the softness of them. I got 12-24 size and I am 5'4" at 180 lbs.... I love these leggings and they look awesome with a flower design on the right cafe from my decal.
customer_reviews.author: sharonc

customer_reviews.title: Super super comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and opaque and SO soft. I bought these for my Peter Pan costume, but I wear them all the time and even bought another pair. Love.
customer_reviews.author: xarata

customer_reviews.title: Yikes stitching
customer_reviews.text: Fit: Great. +1 Material: Awesome +1 Stitching:......not so much. I literally just took them out of the package and tried them on (Id been saving them for an upcoming trip) and there is a HUGE hole where the stitching cane apart PLUS two additional small ones AND some weird Frankenstein stitching on the hip. Actually, I don’t even think the holes got stitched, it looks like it got skipped entirely??? I have bought leggings from this brand before (regular waist band) and they were/are amazing and had high hopes for these but, uh, yeah. Yikes. I’ll be sending these back. :(
customer_reviews.author: GKA

customer_reviews.title: Classy Essentials
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - The way it looks on you - Soft satin - Color variety (I got a few black for my wardrobe) - Size availability - Price point - Elastic band is comfortably re-inforced No cons. Just make sure to follow sizing and account for some shrinkage after the first wash. I was not compensated in any way for this review. I like to provide open, honest and transparent feedback on products I like to try. I hope you found this review helpful. If so, please click the 'Helpful' button to let myself and others know it has helped you.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with these. They are thick, incredibly soft, and opaque! I got these for a Halloween costume but now I'm thinking of ordering more colors. You can't beat the price! My only problem with them is because they are one size, and I'm rather thin, they're big on me. I'm 5'10, so they might bunch at the ankles for someone shorter than I. They are also rather high-waisted, which isn't my thing, but it's not really a deal breaker either. All and all, good leggings. I added some pictures. For the record I'm 5'10, 138lb and have a 25" waist and 34.5" inseam.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Money

customer_reviews.title: Everyone said these were great, they are not
customer_reviews.text: Everyone said these were great, they are not, they are thin, they already have 3 small holes in them the first time I am wearing them, I hand washed and line dried them, as they smell odd when you get them. They are not too tight for me, they fit fine, I am 5'4" and 180 lbs, they are not stretched at all, so they should not already have holes, these are nothing like my LLR or the quality, I guess I can wear them camping in winter as an under layer. I certainly will pay the extra money and look for solid colors at the LLR pop ups, because these are awful and a waste of $10.99
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these leggings! I got them in the mail today and am back to order more! I got the black, they are nice and thick. Not at all see through. I wear size 3/4 or 5/6 jeans and these fit me perfectly. They seem like the would stretch to fit bigger sizes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Enenbach

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They are soft but quality is terrible. They are also baggy on the ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I spy with my naked eye.....my not so little thigh
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these on sale around Christmas. I really, REALLY wanted to like them....because who likes paying for items you can’t use, right? I liked that they carried plus size so kudos for that. Yes, they are soft. However, I purchased these to wear in public....two words: “ain’t happening “. Though I went up in size hoping they would be less see through.... I could see through them by holding them up into the light. I guess they will be inside wear for when it is cooler or to wear under sleep shirts. Sigh. I should have believed the negative reviews. Shame on Amazon for dropping their standards by letting items listed on their website be lacking in quality.
customer_reviews.author: BrownEyedGirl

customer_reviews.title: SO soft, waist is a little tight
customer_reviews.text: These are the softest leggings I’ve ever owned. I’m between a size 12-14 on the bottom but in the waist I’m a size 8-10 so I went with the “One Size (0-12)” option. For being curvier in the butt, these weren’t see-through at all! They’re thick enough to cover everything, even if I squat or bend over. The only thing is that the waist is a little tight. Not uncomfortably tight, but less stretchy than the actual leggings. I probably wouldn’t wear a fitted dress over these because of the tighter waist line but otherwise for everyday use, they’re solid
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: BUTTER!!! BUY NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm Markus's wife giving the review. BUTTER!!!! OMG THIS IS WHERE I'M BUYING LEGGINGS FROM NOW ON!!! Seriously I will never buy from anywhere else ever again! The price is right, the quality is unmatched anywhere else!! The only TINY thing that I wish these had was a yoga or "thick/wide" waistband. Other than that these are PERFECT! It LITERALLY felt like I was slipping into buttery silk! I'm so happy I found these! Lula eat your heart out! I'll be ordering more soon!! Oh btw I'm a curvy gal. 5.8 270lbs ordered the 3xto5xthey fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Only worn once since receiving
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Only worn once since receiving. Super soft. Color is true black. Had some good friends (gotta love them!) check to see if the leggings pass the “bend over” test. Nothing shows through as of yet. My friends asked about them and are going to order too. Need to wash, but won’t be putting them in the dryer for good measure. To be fair, I don’t dry many of my clothes. If they pass the wash test a time or two, I’ll be ordering more! Hope they hold up a bit. For the price, I wouldn’t complain if they only last 6 months though. Time will tell! Only gave 4 stars since it hasn’t been enough time.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I took these out of ththe package to try them on, and as I was pulling them up my fingers literally started popping through them and making holes, and I dont even have long nails. I will definitely be returning these. Confused as to how they have such good reviews
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Bargain Leggings
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft feel, and they go on okay, but the leggings did ride down a bit in the back when bending over...also the material was sufficiently opaque, but thinner than I expected. They are comfortable, but not stretchy enough to easily pull up over my full calves if I have to pull them up for any reason. Overall, not bad for a one-size-fits-all at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Pickie Reader

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit at waist
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are soft but very uncomfortable due to the waistband. I'm at my holiday weight of 115 lbs. so I'm in no way fat but this waistband is so tight I feel like it's cutting off my blood supply. No joke! These leggings are probably going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: These are great! they are a little thinner than i expected ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! they are a little thinner than i expected but not in a bad way. I thought I ordered black but I got grey. I am 5 feet tall, so i expected to have to adjust a little, so i wear these with my boots and no problem. I will be ordering at least 3 more pair so I can work out in these bad boys. They are truly like second skin. DO wear this with long shirts or with a skirt. Do not wear these as pants people. They are too thin for that.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenixmoon3

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in black. Very soft material, the wide waistband is awesome, & the length hit my ankles. I ordered the 0-12 size (which is the size I wear in LLR) and these seem to run small. I ended up giving these to my 14 yr. Old daughter (wears a juniors small) and they were VERY fitted. I don't think she'll be able to wear for long. Although the fabric is "butter soft" it's surprisingly thin, so you would definitely need a tunic length top to cover the behind.
customer_reviews.author: trista

customer_reviews.title: Love these! I have purchased 23 pairs from here!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite leggings in the world. I honestly own 23 pairs. Although I have to admit multiple friends have stolen quite a few pairs from me, so all 23 aren’t in my possession. Every time I wear them I feel compelled to buy another pair, so I’m never without them. They are insanely soft and super warm. Great for everything from the exercising and yoga, to lounging around the house, to popping on with a cute top and running errands. They are soft cotton, not that weird shiny lycra material, so they look like normal clothing and not just gym wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie J

customer_reviews.title: Big butts with no Cellulite recommended!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are the cheapest you'll get.. And if you have any little bit of cellulite and you want to keep it a secrect...... Shop something else. Also. my butt is been considered large by my loving husband and these things in medium sized didn't even come close to fully them out.... And they went up over my belly button.
customer_reviews.author: USMC~Wife~151

customer_reviews.title: Stick 'em where the sun don't shine
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Leggings Depot... but this was a straight miss. I am 5'10" size 14/16 with a 34" inseam. I buy the plus size to get the height and a loose fit. These solid mustard yellow leggings were more like tights. They did not have the white lining that the patterned leggings have which are not see-through. On top of that, you can see every imperfection in your skin that tights even have the decency to hide. They were long enough though? RETURN, do not buy the solid leggings.
customer_reviews.author: lmpromptuTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY! SCAM!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were such a complete waste of money. The material pilled up and left fabric everywhere I went, I only got to wear them TWICE, before they ripped in the seams. On top of that, when I tried to write a review sooner to warn people, the company HAD SHUT THE ABILITY TO REVIEW OFF!!! Such a scam!! Do not waste your money on this product. I do not know how this is an amazon choice product or how it has so many reviews, but dont believe it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough of how much I love these leggings
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough of how much I love these leggings. After ordering one pair, I ordered five more and actually just gave this one to my son to give to his MIL who is visiting from a warm climate to the Artctic weather we are now having in the Northeast. I was out of heat for about 15 hours...these leggings were priceless in keeping me warm enough until heat was restored. This is besides being the softest, most comfortable things I have ever put on. Legging Depot has a big fan in me, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Joyce

customer_reviews.title: I am NOT happy AT all
customer_reviews.text: I am NOT happy AT all. Literally opened the package and put them right on only to find a ginormous hole in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ) The other great plus is
customer_reviews.text: Pros and cons. But more pros then cons, so they are keepers. I just ordered 4 more pairs. They are very soft and comfy and NO STATIC (Yay!) The other great plus is: the waist is exactly where the waist should be: right ON the waist, meaning, higher than most others that stop at the belly button and give you a muffin top belly. One minus the manufacturer would do well to do something about: they don’t taper off enough at the ankles, and they are a little too long. So: the problem is at the ankles, and is still a minor problem.
customer_reviews.author: Levana

customer_reviews.title: Not shaped for plus size!
customer_reviews.text: So they lump 3x - 5x as 1 size but I thought I'd give it a try. It's really unfortunate for us big girls. I'm size 22/24 and am 5'7. However for me, they were way too long in the leg -- they bunched at my knees and ankles. The thighs didn't have enough stretch so the crotch was too low and uncomfortable. Definitely not high waisted on me. These also felt more like stockings which I don't think I like very much. They took skinny people leggings and made them bigger with no consideration of shape. If you're basically straight down with relatively small hips (or proportion) these may be good for you.
customer_reviews.author: thejadster

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but slides down a lot
customer_reviews.text: While the fabric has a nice stretch to it and it is high waisted, the leggings do slide down a lot. I find myself always having to pull it up. It slides down pretty easily so the waist band area is loose. It does not help tuck in your tmy either. As for the pockets, if you put your cell phone in the pockets, that helps the leggings fall down even more. I wish to love it, but I don't and it's too late to return them. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: taro buns

customer_reviews.title: Pants of Many Colors
customer_reviews.text: Hello, wanted to note first: these are dream soft! They're priced right and available in colors to match any top, shoes, bag or roll. Despite years using Amazon, my reviews are few. Just consider the miracle of this review appearing.. Geez might as well order a pair now. Save time, skip the verbosity required in leaving a review. Over 25 words. Maybe it was 25000 but no matter. Colors black to indescribable lol. Fun. These comfy Leggings Depot High Waisted Leggings are soft. Hmm. Probably could have consolidated entire review to: Soft, comfy colorful pants. So far seems worth expenditure. Buy some! Will post on how these wear
customer_reviews.author: Rachael B.

customer_reviews.title: So-so leggings, weird smell is a turnoff
customer_reviews.text: Black leggings are a staple in my wardrobe and these are a fine addition, however there are a few things that I'm not in love with. First, these have a weird smell upon opening the package. I moved forward with wearing them and then washed them as normal, however the smell still lingers. I also really prefer for my leggings to have a compression-like high waistband. These do check the box for high waistband, but I wouldn't say these are "control top". I'm not sure I'd purchase these again. In fact, I've already started looking for another pair and will definitely be making sure the next pair "checks the boxes" more than these.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for under dresses. Definitely meant for long legs
customer_reviews.text: These are great for what I needed them for. What you need to know is, I’m 5’3” and these were very long on me, which I didn’t mind, but someone might, and they are thin, so they aren’t meant to be pants and are definitely meant to be worn under something. I haven’t done squats or anything, but I don’t think they’re see through, but you can definitely see prominent panty lines.
customer_reviews.author: I’m not a professional, but...

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are SUPER SOFT and comfortable and thick enough that you can’t see through them when you bend over. I’ll likely be purchasing a few more pairs because I’m basically living in leggings lately. One downside—I wish there was slightly more tummy control. These are high waisted, so the band/tightest fit is around my belly button area. This causes slight bulging above and below the band—not too bad though!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but problematic.
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and comfortable, but the hems started coming out after the first wash. The worst part was the amount of dye that came out of these leggings, it was actually unnerving. The first time I wore these out my legs were literally dark purple by the end of the day. I found that I'd smeared dye all over my new white down comforter, I'd left leg prints on the wall near my toilet, etc. Even after five washes or so these leggings are still leeching color everywhere. Kind of gross to think of all the chemical dye that I probably absorbed into my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Geroux

customer_reviews.title: NOT MY FAVORITE LEGGINGS
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered other leggings from Leggings Depot and I have been very satisfied, however, I have to be honest that these aren't my favorite black leggings. First of all, they smell. I had to wash them before even attempting to wear them. Also, they do not contain any cotton whatsoever. They are very soft and they do have a great deal of stretch but they also don't appear very 'black'. They appear more charcoal 'grey'. Personally, I like my leggings with some cotton in them. It makes them look richer and deeper in color. These don't look as 'dressy' if that makes sense? But they are comfortable and they are not see through.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome leggings!
customer_reviews.text: Ladies, if you are looking for the perfect legging, this is it!! I have ordered 6 pairs of these. They wash up great, and the instructions do say line dry, which I did. They are comfortable, they don't ride up at the ankle. I am a size 14, so I ordered in the Plus Size. The fit is wonderful, the colors are great, they are a nice fabric that you can't see through. Go for it ladies!! I highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wolflvr65

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, hopefully they last
customer_reviews.text: I got these in mustard 3x-5x and wild ginger in 12-22(or 24). I am a solid 24, 4'11 and most of my weight is in my belly and butt. They both fit very well around my waist area, the 12-22/4 were of course a little tighter but not uncomfortably so. My underwear wasn't visible through either. They are very soft, I guess people say buttery, like Lula Roe. The color of the wild ginger was very close to the picture, a muted dusky rose. The mustard yellow was a little brighter than I was expecting, but not awful. I don't think I'll return either as of right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sachse

customer_reviews.title: mine are holding up great, I love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these leggings, mine are holding up great, I love them. The pair I gave to my sister gor a hole in the butt the first day she wore them...like in the middle of the fabric, not at the seam...I felt bad about that. They're super soft and comfortable, many people read leggings reviews to see how they compare to the LLR ones. Well to me they're just as soft and I'm more comfortable wearing them during everyday life since they're half the price. The waistband is smaller than LLR and has the bunched fabric around elastic instead of a wider smooth waistband, so I do prefer the LLR waistband...but for this price, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Fabric and fit have SADLY changed :-(
customer_reviews.text: I’m sad that the material and fit of these leggings have changed. I last purchased them a year ago and they were super stretchy and long. I purchased them again recently and the material is no longer stretchy, they are shorter and they aren’t even soft. They dye your legs and would never last through a dry cycle without shrinking. I’m so bummed as these used to be my favorite and I would tell everyone to buy them. I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to go with a Halloween costume. The one-size worried me a little but because of the great price I thought I'd give them a try. They are a little bit loose, I'm 5'2 and at the time 115 lb. That being said, these aren't the type of leggings I would wear out (I prefer a thicker material) but they worked just fine for costume purposes. I've had them for a long time and was wearing them to sleep in but since they were beginning to start to show a little wear with washing I've tucked them back away with my costume supplies, I"m sure I'll use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew & Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and fit perfectly! Wash well and no holes!!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are very comfortable and very soft. They are an excellent price too! I got the brown and they match with so many outfits. They fit perfectly. I’m 5’6” and 150lbs and I got the one size and they were a perfect fit. They stretch nice and I’ve worn them dozens of times without any pilling or tearing. No holes or any damage. I’ve washed them tons of times and even put them in the dryer without any issues. Love these!! I’ve bought more in many other colors too!! Definitely going to be a repeat customer over and over because these are amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: SugarPieHoneyBunch:)

customer_reviews.title: Their okay
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews saying this girl got these and was like 5’6 and 200 pounds which is similar to me but I’m taller so i figured it would work, these are skin tight they go to my ankles and I’m 5’9ish but pulling them out the bag looked so tiny they like stretched to my fatness haha feel like I have to pull them up every 10 mins I will stick to buying in stores for my weird size and shape haha one size fits all does not fit all but now that I took tags off can’t return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but for the price these are good leggings.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" 150 lbs (about). I'm also 22 weeks pregnant and my normal weight is around 130. These numbers may not matter. But seeing mixed reviews on this products had me second guessing my purchase. I was pleasantly surprised by how soft and stretchy these are. They are a little baggie near the calf area and ankles, but for the price these are great leggings. Another big plus about these (at least for me) is how comfortable they are and breathable. Almost feels like you arent wearing pants. I bought the burgundy pair and black pair and they arrived in standard clothing packaging with no imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four pairs of these leggings after reading the reviews. I was concerned they wouldn't be long enough (I am about 5'6" and average weight), but they fit down to my ankles like I want. They are very soft and comfortable with no discomfort from the seam. The colors are nice and as expected. I did not give 5 stars because I have only washed them once and am not sure how the color will hold up. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lambb5

customer_reviews.title: Great leggings
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are awesome! As soon as I got them, I wore them to the gym. I’m 5’7” 160 lbs and bought a size large. They were a tiny bit loose around the waist but otherwise fit great. They are not see through when you bend over which is always a plus in my book when it comes to leggings. I will be considering ordering more in other colors if they hold up well over time. Ohh also they have pockets!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Soft, thick leggings. They are bigger than they appear.
customer_reviews.text: Omg. Great leggings... with pockets! I went by other reviews for sizing. When they arrived I opened the package and thought "these are too small".... Nope. They look smaller than they are. I ordered Large for my size of 5'8" 178lbs. I've lost 40+lbs and needed new workout pants, but being unable during this time to go try on pants, I bought ones online, which can be hit or miss. I'm pleasantly surprised. These are thicker than my other yoga pants, which is great, and super soft. Pockets on both sides and actual high waist of 4-5". Hold my jiggly tummy in! Love these. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: andrea h

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I will say that these leggings are super soft and comfortable, basically the only positive. I am 5'6'' and they are way too short on me, basically like capris. And they are not as tight as I would like them to be around the waist, but that's what you get with a "one size fits all" item. They also have a super weird smell, almost like a burnt smell? I have washed them a couple times and they still smell exactly the same. They're decent for the price, but I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Let’s concur the World!
customer_reviews.text: I have about seven pairs of those leggings in different colors and patterns. I wear them for yoga, exercises, and everyday wear. The colors are nice, do not change after many washes. Most important, they do not roll down in the middle of yoga pose, as many sport pants are. Also, fabric is soft and thin, but not see through, and not itchy. In order to look good, put on those leggings, booties and sweater, and you are ready to concur the World!
customer_reviews.author: Kreina Clement

customer_reviews.title: Very Very SMALL....Sizing Way off
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is way way off...Way too tiny and cheap, could not even try it on, too small. And the fabric is so cheap, Don't waste your money, I am returning it and will not purchase again. I do not recommend this. It is a joke size 11 to 20 There is No Way, it looks more like a size 2 to 6. Not good. I just have to honestly share my experience. They should be honest with the listing, and provide measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra A.

customer_reviews.title: Thin and silky ... but keep in mind that they ARE very thin
customer_reviews.text: I just love these. Very soft, very stretchy, more opaque than I expected since they are so thin. I would not recommend wearing these without a long tunic or something covering your behind, simply because they really are very thin, but that's why they are so comfortable. Perfect for wearing with my favorite caftans. They are warmer than you would expect for being so thin, as well, so keep that in mind for summer. On a cool spring day they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Comfortable, but Thin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased black yoga leggings. The leggings are one size fits all. They are super soft as others have mentioned. The band on the waist is not a band but just looks like one. The elastic around the waist is snug and does not slip like most leggings. The fabric is silky and hugs my legs. I really like these leggings for around the house but I wouldn't wear them out unless I had something long over them because they are quite thin and unlined, and feel like I'm wearing nothing!
customer_reviews.author: goldilvr

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF THE STAIN IT CREATES
customer_reviews.text: These leggings stained my couch, toilet seat, shower, and even my own legs. I noticed this blue color on my toilet seat and didn’t understand what it could be... ended up being the leggings!! They bleed the color and stain everything in their path! I’m so sad because these fit perfect and were so soft but the stain is truly not worth it. I’m so embarrassed of everything that they stained and I hope I can help warn others before it happens to them!
customer_reviews.author: Delaware tay

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about a "one size" fits all. I got the 0-12 in black. I normally wear an 8 in women's and an 11 in juniors. These are a little long, which is not surprising since I'm only 5'1". But other than that they fit wonderfully. They are super soft and they don't get baggy after wearing them. They maintain their elasticity, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: pjtavish

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great but...
customer_reviews.text: I have only one complaint and that it that they are not colorfast. I placed them in cold water with a touch of soap for first washing and the water turned extremely murky due to dye bleed. I have soaked and rinsed them for several hours till the water finally ran clear. As I researched ordering these I noted a complaint about these pants staining someones exercise equipment due to color bleed. And she had already washed them before wearing them. Just make sure you give them a good cold water washing, maybe a few before wearing. Other than that they are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sourdough

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and fit great
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings so much. They're soft, not too light, but not too heavy. They hold their shape pretty well after washing, too. Plus they come in so many colors! The colors are rich and vibrant. I have long legs and often have trouble with pants/leggings that are long enough, but these are good, but I could see them working well for someone with shorter legs, too. Finally! Leggings that don't cost an arm and a leg and are comfortable and have lots of options!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Lularoe
customer_reviews.text: I really like these leggings.......they are comparable to lularoe and ill list the similarities/differences. If you are on the smaller side.... I would recommend lularoe these are a little baggy-er. These are thinner and softer than lularoe, they feel like suede-ish. These are more high waisted than lularoe and have a thin elastic band at the top. These leggings are also looser around my ankles. For the price this is a great alternative. :) I got the plain olive color and it matches my lularoe dresses and tops perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: summerjeng

customer_reviews.title: Can be see-through where stretched, waistband uncomfortable for chronic pain.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a lularoe leggings buyer all the way, but I needed some colors I wasn’t able to find from them. I decided to try these. The material is equally as soft as lula, but it is noticeably thinner and can be a bit see through in areas where they are more stretched. The lack of a yoga waistband is a bit of a dealbreaker for me- it’s ansolutrly necessary for me due to a chronic pain condition. I kept these in hopes I can wear them for short outings, but will not purchase again unless the yoga waist band becomes available.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Navy Blue???
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, the so called 'Navy Blue" isn't. Navy is a deep rich colour. These are more like a deeper Royal blue that would have been returned if I hadn't discovered that one of my tops had exactly the same blue in it. I wear a size 16 pant which is why I ordered the Plus Size (L-2X ) which is supposed to fit sizes 12-1=20. While the leggings definitely do fit, they are quite tight on the waist. However, on the positive side they are a good length comfortably reaching my ankles ( I am 5.9 plus) and are quite soft. I am not sure I would ever buy another pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Cab98

customer_reviews.title: SOFT SOFT SOFT AND COMFY
customer_reviews.text: These leggings... oh my goodness these leggings! They are so soft and comfortable! I want to wear these all winter long! I have very long legs and these still go to my ankles (not many leggings do that). Did I mention they are super soft? I put these on and immediately came back to order some more and to get my mom some... These super soft, plush, lush whatever you want to call it leggings have changed the game. Don't hesitate order these leggings, just make sure it says fulfilled by Leggings Depot, otherwise it could be some third party scammer that will give you sub-par leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Claiborne

customer_reviews.title: BEST LEGGINGS EVER
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are the softest clothing I have ever worn. Soft, luxurious yet wear well; not too delicate. These leggings stretch well as the fabric intends, without being constricting or compressing. Some leggings for sport are meant to be compression leggings; more "heavy duty" and not as comfortable as these are. These go all the way to the ankle, and yet don't constrict or impede with circulation. The most comfortable leggins ever, and very attractive, too. Fit so well. I am over the moon to have FINALLY found leggings that fit, look great, AND feel so soft and comfortable. I'm going to purchase multiple pairs for sure.
customer_reviews.author: TimCurryIsGod

customer_reviews.title: Almost the best leggings I've ever warn
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! These are so soft. I'm 5' 8" and weigh 141 lbs. They fit perfect. I was worried they'd be loose behind the knee because of one of the pictures but they fit to my skin. They are no too tight and fabric is a wonderful stretch to it. So I can sit, swat, stand without feeling like I'm losing circulation. So it pretty much feels like I'm not wearing anything. ONLY one negative: tag says hand wash and hang dry. I'm raising a household of 7, working 2 jobs, I know I'm going to forget and throw it in the hamper with regular clothes!
customer_reviews.author: e.LUBELSKI

customer_reviews.title: BEST. LEGGINGS.
customer_reviews.text: OH. MY. GOD. These leggings are SO AMAZINGLY SOFT. Other leggings are ruined for me now because they feel like burlap compared to these. When I saw the one size fits all thing before checking out, I was VERY skeptical, not gonna lie. 'One size' products never fit me because I have a tiny waist and huge hips with average length legs. My dimensions are a bit weird... but this really did fit me comfortably. I'm not sure what this witchcraft is but I must learn to harness it somehow. Maybe it'll help me do my taxes and clean my floors, idk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, feels like butter!
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness of the material and how it moves with you and there's enough material so that when you wash them it allows for shrinkage. I've ordered (3) different colors so far white, khaki and charcoal. I've only washed the khaki pair so far, like I said there's a lot of material on the legs at the bottom, but the length appears to be okay. I'm loving them and will give an update on shrinkage once I try them on. I plan to order them in more in more colors because they're so doggone comfortable! I plan to get a lot more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa530

customer_reviews.title: While I agree that these are the softest leggings I’ve ever owned and the quality seems great, the one size fits all is not actually ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a mixed review. I purchased 2 pair of these leggings, one for myself and one for my daughter. While I agree that these are the softest leggings I’ve ever owned and the quality seems great, the one size fits all is not actually true. The leggings fit me fine, (5’3” size 8), but they are super baggy on my daughter who is 5’ and a size 0. Size 0 is hard to fit and I wouldn’t usually say anything but these leggings are advertised as size 0 up so I think it’s important to point this out.
customer_reviews.author: niclinzmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric but runs small and ankle is wide
customer_reviews.text: I love the fabric it's a little thick for the summer but I like the stretch on it. The rise on it is medium not too high but not low, I think the rise is perfect for me. The only drawback for me was that the ankle is wide and I like it to be fitted at the bottom and not floating around on my ankle. I hate that feeling. I sew, so I am going to take it in on the ankle part only.
customer_reviews.author: Styleninja007

customer_reviews.title: Good leggings for price
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. The waistband is a little thicker than I'd hoped for but that doesn't show anyway so not a big deal. These fit very nicely, especially for a "one size" item. I'm 5 ft 3, 140lbs, 38-26-39 measurements and am pleased with the fit. I must wear on my actual waist, not hips as the elastic would be comfortable and would probably dig in if I tried to wear them lower. Would order again, meets my expectations of a simple pair of black leggings to pair with tunic style tops.
customer_reviews.author: HermitsloveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Color and fit come together
customer_reviews.text: The weight of material was what I'd expected having read the reviews. However I wasn't looking for anything heavy so this was OK. The colors were absolutely wonderful, off the wall!! I often mix red and purple and these colors are just perfect for mixing. If there was a flaw, it was the length. I'm 5'10'' with long legs. The leggings are a little short; I'd like to see a couple of inches longer. Women with shorter legs could scrunch them at the ankle. Other than that everything is great. I plan on buying a few more solids and several pair of prints.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyhawk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 colors. One of them being white. Sadly, the white was too see through for me. But I kept the other 2. I am 166 lbs 5'3 with 42 inch hips and ordered the one size. They are buttery soft.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie_and_David

customer_reviews.title: Shiny Lycra Material - you have been warned!
customer_reviews.text: I came looking for LuLaRoe type leggings. You know buttery soft and cozy. I read some mixed reviews (some said like LuLa some said no way) but decided to give these a try. I’m so disappointed!! If you are going for the 80s bicycle shorts/spandex look then these are for YOU! They are not buttery soft or matte. They are shiny, tacky, Lycra -Blech! I gave 2 stars since they arrived on time and were in fact black.
customer_reviews.author: GlassSlipper

customer_reviews.title: Love these...
customer_reviews.text: I almost always never (an occasional p.j.) buy one size fits all because they rarely do. Therefore I was amazed when I tried on the leggings and the fit was perfect. To my further delight the material is soft and comfortable while not being see through. I purchased a brown pair and uselessly worried that it would be a muddy looking color. They are beautiful and I'm ordering more in various colors!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: These are extremely comfortable, but with the light directly on them and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft material, but the white is semi see through. These are extremely comfortable, but with the light directly on them and while squatting you can see undies. You can also see the rest of my tattoo shown in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: ginger leighanne

customer_reviews.title: Picture is not how they look
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these leggings specifically for the waistline. I went thru ever color and noticed the black ones had a thicker waist line, but upon receiving realized they did not. The waistline is thin like the rest of them. I needed them for an outdoor final I had, and they did a great job at keeping me warm under my jeans, but I'm not sure I will ever be wearing these as an outer layer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Amazing, Best Leggings Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are incredible! I bought 19 of them! Yeah, you read that right: NiNETEEN colors ,(obsessed much?) I'm happy I decided to trust the five star reviews. They are buttery soft and very comfortable. The leggings are totally opsgue (you can't see through them,). Also, they are longer than most leggings, and I like that (I'm 5'5"). Easily one of the best purchases I've ever made. These are truly one-size-fits-all, so don't be afraid of that tag. A friend of mine has a very straight body and very small legs. I'm a slim hourglass, and they fit the bioth of us! Overall, I am ecstatic about my purchase. These are the best leggings I have ever worn--I mean that.
customer_reviews.author: Jia

customer_reviews.title: Best leggings!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously love these leggings. I wanted something to lounge around my apartment in during the colder months so I picked up a pair of these leggings. I’ve had trouble in the past with leggings being too see-through but figured since I planned to wear these as loungewear it didn’t really matter. BUT, these leggings are so perfect! They aren’t too thin or see-through, they are SO SOFT and they stay up nicely. I even wore these with a hoodie to walk next door to CVS and to my campus library (I’m a grad student in a big city). Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FADED ON FIRST WASH - Leggings Depot High Waisted Leggings, Black
customer_reviews.text: I always wash new clothes B4 wearing, so EXTREMELY disappointed these legging faded after ONE WASH, in Cold Water using "Woolite Darks" (made to prevent fading), which I use on all my black clothes. I loved everything about these leggings - good quality fabric, very soft, flattering fit - and now I can't wear them out of the house. Guess that's the chance u take when u wash b4 u wear???? I've purchased other leggings & joggers from Legging Depot, so I thought it was a safe choice :( Sooo disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopperNJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not enough coverage & support for gym
customer_reviews.text: Nice color & fabric but not enough coverage to hide my dark thong. Also do not care for the elastic string on top of pants. It cuts into your belly & sticks out when I put on a form fitting top. A wide elastic band to help tuck tummy in would have been much better. I am a gym fanatic & have a lot of high quality gym clothes including LuluLemon. These pants are ok around the house but don't expect to run errands in them or wear them to the gym. Just not enough coverage & elastic support.
customer_reviews.author: Lena B.

customer_reviews.title: The dye from leggings is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these a five if there wasn’t one problem... the dye that comes from these leggings is absolutely horrible! I wear them for a few hours and my legs turn black and my hands turn black the moment I touch them. I wish I could return them but I am out of my return window. Just be advised don’t buy these unless you want dye all over your body. Just go to Walmart and get the same kind of leggings for $7. They are way nicer and do not dye you.
customer_reviews.author: Turman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent source for solid colored comfy leggings
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of plain black super soft leggings and these were perfect! I had initially bought a pair from another retailer on Amazon and they were a faded off-black color, and a bit too tight, so I tried again ordering from Leggings Depot. These are a true dark black, super soft, perfectly sized, and seem to just get softer after washing. Since then, I've bought a couple more pairs and they have all been good. My only slight complaint is I bought a charcoal gray pair and they are definitely more of a bluish gray, not charcoal, but for the price I'm not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: tkrazy

customer_reviews.title: Soft and functional
customer_reviews.text: These are super soft. For the sizing if you are on the 10/12 range I would size up. I got the one size and while they fit, they did squish me a little. I ordered the plus size and it feels better. The elastic could be a bit more forgiving but they’ll do. They are nice fabric and don’t seem to be see through.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kane

customer_reviews.title: My favorite leggings!
customer_reviews.text: For anyone running away from that...um, other leggings company, these leggings are just as good if not better than those. They are super stretchy without being see-through, and are SO DANG SOFT! I love them, and you really can't go wrong with the price. My husband and kids always want to feel my legs when I'm wearing these because of how soft they are. As long as strangers don't start feeling up my legs, I'm going to keep buying them. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, a little see-through, not the most flattering ever... average to good
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfy pants. A little on the larger side for me (normally wear a 4-6 in pant size and ordered the size 0-12), but not baggy by any means. Somewhat see-through (white), but not horrible considering the price. Used them for a halloween costume so didn't care a ton about that honestly. Not the mostly flattering, revealing every little detail of the legs/butt. Normally tight fitting pants/leggings/workout pants fit and flatter no problem on me, as a reference. Overall, not the best leggings I've ever bought, but not the worst. And considering the price, I'll take it :) Darker colors might be better!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh Leake

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE SEE-THROUGH
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Yoga Black OS pair of leggings. I got these and they felt really soft. I had good faith in these because of the reviews but maybe mine are different. These are ABSOLUTELY see-through. I tried them on - and took a look in the mirror... yeah. Can't wear these out! The cloth feels pretty cheap as well. I'm going to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: They live up the hype
customer_reviews.text: I saw these on a buzzfeed article claiming that they were the best leggings ever... and I live in leggings. I own about 20 pairs of leggings and like 3 jeans. Anyways, I bought a pair to see if it lived up the hype. And it does. I squat tested it and I passed! Not to mention THEYRE SO SOFT!! I seriously wore them for three days straight before my husband made me take them off, and then I ordered two more.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Basic legging. Wish they were a thicker material.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 13yr old daughter. She's 5.5 1/2 inches tall, weighs 120, and has an athletic build. These are buttery soft when you first get them eventhough that's not exactly the material we were looking for. They fit as expected. I do wish they were a little thicker tho. They are a good value, but we prefer the styles that will last longer. These are just your basic legging.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi VHook

customer_reviews.title: So soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t wear leggings often, but wanted a casual pair I could wear to run errands. The reviews for these leggings were great and the price was certainly right, so I chose these over some various “name brand” leggings I was looking at. Wow, I am not disappointed! These leggings are absurdedly soft, are light/thin but not see through, and the one size fit my average built, 5’4 frame perfectly. I have not washed these yet so not sure how well they hold up after several wears and washes. Also, as I mentioned, the material is light so I wouldn’t wear these in really cold weather. But for the price, I am really happy with these basic leggings. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, no holes or weirdness.
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of mixed reviews and some photos of leggings with holes that made me not so sure about buying these. But I decided to take a chance and I’m glad I did. I now have 4 pairs of these leggings, all black or navy. They’re comfortable and have held up well to many washings. The fit was just as expected. They are a little long for me (I’m 5’6”), but I always wear them under dresses, so I just pull them up a bit until I’m happy with the leg length. If you’re wearing them as pants, that would definitely be a bigger concern.
customer_reviews.author: EmSeg

customer_reviews.title: These leggings are nice and soft but they are not holding up
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are nice and soft but they are not holding up. I bought them last spring after my sister gave me a pair of LuLaRoe leggings which are pretty pricey and require going to a "Tupperware" party for purchase. So I tried a couple of pair from Amazon, these being one of them. On the plus side, they're soft and have good stretch. They don't sag or bunch up. On the negative side, they are starting to come apart along the middle seam where the stitches go into the fabric. I suspect they won't last much longer and I certainly won't buy another pair. It could be an outlier but I'm not taking chances.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Durden

customer_reviews.title: Soft and great color, but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: These leggings could have been great. They are very soft ( not quite the "butter" leggings but close) and the color is great and they aren't see through. However, the waistband is all over the place. The seam goes above the elastic, and there are stray threads everywhere. They are also much longer than I think would fit most people. I have them pulled alllll the way up ( granny panty style yo) and evenly distributing the leg part around still leaves me with a bunch scrunched at the bottom. Overall. They are good, not great. Will I wear them? Yes. Would I buy them again? No.
customer_reviews.author: ACole1004

customer_reviews.title: Not all the same
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one pair in brown and I loved them they fit perfectly (ordered the one siZe) so I decided to order a second pair in Mauve and they were a completely different pair of leggings and I hated the way they fit. They had a totally different elastic band at the top and didn’t fit as nice as the first pair. Was disappointed that their products were not consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these in various colors. They are soooo comfortable. I'm 5'8" and my weight fluctuates from 175 to 210. The plus size fits perfectly, and I love that they have enough length. These are so soft, that it's like wearing a second skin! While they are a tad bit thinner material than LuLaRoe, I believe they are comparable. And what a price! The only reason that I gave 4 stars is because one pair had a seam hole about 2 inches long. I am returning them, and it looks like they already have the replacement ready to go once UPS picks the defective ones up.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne B Carr

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay up
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about these leggings. I bought them for an international trip and wore them on our travel days. Big mistake! Once I stood up after sitting for a while, they were falling down. I kept having to pull them back up over and over again, I felt like I was doing it constantly. To make matter worse, the falling down took my underwear with it, which was super uncomfortable and quite embarrassing!
customer_reviews.author: CaitlinRTodd

product_meta.title: Leggings Depot High Waisted Leggings -Soft & Slim - Solid Colors & 1000+ Prints
feature_bullets: Ultra Soft Premium Fabric - Our classic leggings are made in our buttery smooth brushed polyester and spandex blend. It’ll stretch in all directions without being see-through and keeping you comfortable all day!
All Day Comfort - Leggings that will keep you comfortable whether you’re just hanging out at home or out with friends, our leggings will look great paired with dresses, tops or tunics!

Comfortable Waistband - Leggings Depot leggings come in all sizes and even different waistbands. We have our original classic high waisted 1” waistband and 3”, 5” yoga waistbands as well! Take your pick!
Selection - At Leggings Depot we have the largest selection of leggings in different colors, prints and sizes at the most affordable prices.
*** Special Launching Sale Event: Athletic Yoga Pants with Side Pockets. Only a limited quantity in stock!!! Please compare with $20~25 market prices!!! ***
